actions.recommendation: Unilateral hearing loss requires an NET assessment and full audiogram. Referral done to Dr van Schalkwyk
The hip and lower back pain wakes you up at night - XRAY imaging has been requested. Please follow up with a GP visit with the results
You are over the age of 50 - Colonoscopy referral has been done. Screening is necessary for colon cancer prevention, mammogram referral also done.
unilateral hearing loss - ENT consult booked
Frequent urination - Start with the XRAYs we have requested and screening referrals - if all normal - Uro-gynaecology referral probably needed
Suboptimal Vit D levels - supplement with vit D 1000iu dly x 3/12 and repeat levels
